data.title: Beautiful Inside Decor & Structure!
data.text: Came here for the National Coalition Of 100 Black Women's Scholarship Fashion Show & Dinner this past weekend because my 9-year old daughter, Alona Leoine, was a special invited guest, model, and designer from Detroit, MI.  Surprisingly it also has various shopping outlets. It was clean, spacious, informative wall plaques, athletic treasures, numerous places to have photography done, and more.  I was impressed.  Wasn't your typical city hall look with bland decor, structure, and wall notations.

data.title: Good from the outside...
data.text: attractive gothic style structure. good for photo. Inside= not so impressed. Good to see if near, not worth seeking out

data.title: Beautiful Art Deco Gothic Skyscraper
data.text: We happened to walk by the impressive structure and were bowled over by the architecture so we had do go in.  We were parked at the Capitol so decided to go inside.  The lobby is as impressive as the outside and we are glad we took the time.

data.title: Not much to see
data.text: It has been quite some time since I was in Atlanta City Hall, but unless it has changed immeasurably, there is little to attract one who doesn't have business there.  It isn't worth a special trip or the cost of parking.

data.title: For Your Self
data.text: Nothing wrong with City Hall another spot on the map but then if your into things of such then by all means go you'll probably enjoy it.

data.title: Lindo.
data.text: Arquitetura bacana, prédio imponente, exatamente do outro lado da I-75 em direção ao capítólio (cúpula dourada). Muito verde em seu exterior.

data.title: Atlanta City Hall
data.text: Fica em Downtown, próximo ao Capitólio e à The Catholic Shrine of the Immaculate Conception. Bem tranquilo de chegar, existe uma estação do Marta bem próximo.  O prédio é imenso, bem bonito, tem umas pequenas esculturas em seu pequeno jardim que dão um charme ao prédio.

data.title: Memorable
data.text: Atlanta es conocida por ser la sede de Coca Cola, pero tambien por otros atractivos relacionados con la alimentacion. Su paisaje no es muy atractivo, digamos que la ciudad es de un perfil muy plano pero su organizacion y superacion para amoldar los diversos intereses resulta interesante. El City Hall es precisamente una muestra de esta amalgama entre la idiosincracia de Norteamerica y sus legados actuales.  Atlanta es paso obligado entre Texas, Arkansas y el Este de Estados Unidos  asi que en esta ciudad se muestra la apertura comercial del siglo XXI.

data.title: Nada de mais
data.text: Assim como o City Hall de LA, NADA muito diferente na arquitetura, na realidade parece até cópia! Não tem muito pra ver, mas se seu hotel ficar perto não perca a oportunidade!
